previous.excerpt:
Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase, which is preparing to trade publicly in the
next few months, is being valued at $77 billion, based on trading of the
company’s privately held shares on a secondary market.

Those shares in the largest crypto exchange in the U.S. are changing hands on
the Nasdaq…
